h3.a: When will a working version be released?

div.p: A full working version will be possibly out for September 2006. Meanwhile, some prototypes will be released which will gain functionality over releases. I hope I'll be able to follow the Release early, release often model. I can't promise it, however ;)

h3.a: Will a GUI be developed as part of the project?

div.p: Yes, it'll be a KDE based one. However, being a library, other GUI can be developed for it, although I'll only develop the KDE one.

h3.a: Why did you choose GPL license being a library?

div.p: Why not? Oh, wait, do you mean why I didn't choose the LGPL instead? Well, because I prefer its "even if you're only linking against GPL code without modifying it the code where it's being used must be GPL" viral property. However, if you need a special license for LUSI, contact me. Maybe you can convince me ;)

h3.a: Are these really frequently asked questions?

div.p: No, these aren't frequently asked questions. In fact, they weren't even asked :P
